feed.title: Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 1:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: ENE 48 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:56 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:56 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
